comments:
An error occurs while loading cheat sheet 'Navigate Method Content' by click Help -> Cheat Sheets -> Getting Started -> Navigate Method Content.

Invalid non-English character in '/cheatsheets/navigatemethodcontent.xml' cause this problem.

Please see the error log:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.cheatsheets 4 0 2007-03-19 11:06:37.296
!MESSAGE Cheat sheet content file '/cheatsheets/navigatemethodcontent.xml' could not be parsed, error at line '33', column '149'.
